name: Committee of Poly Ethyleneterephthalate (PET) Manufacturers in Europe
goal: The Committee of PET Manufacturers in Europe (CPME) is a European non-profit trade association based in Brussels. It represents almost all of the European PET resin producers who are collectively responsible for 3 million tonnes of production. The main European producers of Terephthalic Acid (PTA) - the major PET feedstock - are Associate Members of CPME.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Trade Defence, Food Contact, REACH, ETS, Circular Economy,
